Distribution in Russia
(
Fig. 2
e). Kursk Prov., Belgorod Prov., Rostov Prov., Volgograd Prov., Orenburg Prov., Stavropol Terr., Astrakhan Prov., Dagestan Republic.

General distribution. Portugal , Spain , France , Germany , Switzerland , Austria , Czech Republic , Slovakia , Hungary , Italy , Croatia , Serbia , Romania , Bulgaria , Greece , Turkey , Ukraine , Russia , Georgia , Azerbaijan , Kazakhstan , Kyrgyzstan , Tajikistan , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan .
